feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content:
This is a test of the blogging system, and also a welcome to anyone interested in this site. Look around and feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions or just want to chat!

This website is a fork of the al-folio that I’ve customized for my needs. It’s hosted by GitHub Pages at my pages repository, using Cloudflare DNS provider.
